ns0:NISTSchema-SV-IV-atomic-string-minLe: popular languages in the world XML is being incorporated into web pages and applications alike particularly in those involved in electronic commerce applications It is a language that describes information in a way that allows computers to exchange and automatically act on the information Consequently it can be used to automate certain processes A set of related technologies built around this Internet language define a rich set of tools that can be used to define manipulate and display context-rich data In particular XML Schemas
